description: ff. 20. 186 x 138; 111 x 84 mm. 13 lin. On fol. 20b ijāzah by Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Sallāmī for the copyist Badr al-Dīn Abū Muḥammad al-ḥasan ibn Aḥmad al-Suyūfī (?), dat. Rabīʻ I, 966. ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 388; Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 72 (11: no. 4). Title in ms., fol. la: Tadhkiyat al-ṭālib. .. Incip.: ... الحمد لله المتوحد بکبرىائه ... وبعد فهذا کتاب مختصر فىمن هو مخضرم
author: Sibṭ ibn al-ʻAjamī, 1352-1438
title: Tadhkirat al-ṭālib al-muʻallam bi-man yuqālu la-hu mukhaḍram
creator: Sibṭ ibn al-ʻAjamī, 1352-1438
subject: Hadith scholars—Biography—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
